testcase.classname: Test adding job title fuctionality in User management
testcase.name: Verify Editing job title functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on homepage...............................................passed And clicks on "Admin" in sidepanel..........................................passed Then User Management section is displayed...................................passed When Admin clicks on job dropdown...........................................passed And selects "Job Titles" in the dropdown....................................passed Then "Job Titles" screen is displayed.......................................passed When Admin clicks on edit icon for job title "Chief Financial Officer"......passed Then "Edit Job Title" form displays.........................................passed When Admin updates Financial Officer, A Software Tester is responsible for ensuring quality of software and I am a detail-oriented professional.passed And Clicks on save button...................................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed And Financial Officer gets added to the table...............................passed
